message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first. I think it would be perfect for you.  I'm asking for $20,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. While I value this product highly, I'm willing to come down to $17,000 for you. I think that's a fair offer considering its true worth.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the reduction, I still believe I can secure the product at a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $14,000 for it.
